Package com.adidas.ui.adapters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ViewPresenter<T>
    Common interface for views that are displayed through adapters
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>
    Reusable adapter for the list which should support android.widget.SectionIndexer interface for sections indexing.
    DrawerAdapter
    Adapter over list of DrawerItem items.
    FilterableAdapter<T>
    Reusable adapter for the list which should support filtering and indexing Use the setFilterMatcher to provide the filtering Use the setViewPresenter to provide the list item view Use the setFilterResultComparator to provide list comparator
    FilterableViewPresenter<T>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DrawerAdapter.RowType
